member.summary: 加密

member.summary: 加密数据

member.summary: 解密

member.name: F:DealMvc.DBUtility.EffentNextType.None
member.summary: 对其他语句无任何影响

member.name: F:DealMvc.DBUtility.EffentNextType.WhenHaveContine
member.summary: 当前语句必须为"select count(1) from .."格式，如果存在则继续执行，不存在回滚事务

member.name: F:DealMvc.DBUtility.EffentNextType.WhenNoHaveContine
member.summary: 当前语句必须为"select count(1) from .."格式，如果不存在则继续执行，存在回滚事务

member.name: F:DealMvc.DBUtility.EffentNextType.ExcuteEffectRows
member.summary: 当前语句影响到的行数必须大于0，否则回滚事务

member.name: F:DealMvc.DBUtility.EffentNextType.SolicitationEvent
member.summary: 引发事件-当前语句必须为"select count(1) from .."格式，如果不存在则继续执行，存在回滚事务

member.name: T:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper
member.summary: The SqlHelper class is intended to encapsulate high performance, scalable best practices for common uses of SqlClient.

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand (that returns no resultset) using an existing SQL Transaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns a resultset against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: SqlDataReader r = ExecuteReader(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns the first column of the first record against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a SqlCommand that returns the first column of the first record against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new SqlParameter("@prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or T-SQL command
an array of SqlParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.CacheParameters(System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: add parameter array to the cache
member.param: an array of SqlParamters to be cached

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.GetCachedParameters(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieve cached parameters

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.SqlHelper.PrepareCommand(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])
member.summary: Prepare a command for execution
member.param: Cmd type e.g. stored procedure or text
Command text, e.g. Select * from Products
SqlParameters to use in the command

member.name: T:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper
member.summary: A helper class used to execute queries against an Oracle database

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a database query which does not include a select
member.param: Command type either stored procedure or SQL
Parameters to bind to the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.Query(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 执行查询语句，返回DataSet

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.GetSingle(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: 执行一条计算查询结果语句，返回查询结果（object）。

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database transaction using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(trans, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteNonQuery(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand (that returns no resultset) against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: int result = ExecuteNonQuery(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
member.returns: an int representing the number of rows affected by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteReader(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.String,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand that returns the first column of the first record against the database specified in the connection string using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(connString, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: a valid connection string for a SqlConnection
the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleTransaction,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute a OracleCommand (that returns a 1x1 resultset) against the specified SqlTransaction using the provided parameters.
member.param: The stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
An array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object containing the value in the 1x1 resultset generated by the command

member.name: M:DealMvc.DBUtility.OracleHelper.ExecuteScalar(System.Data.OracleClient.OracleConnection,System.Data.CommandType,System.String,System.Data.OracleClient.OracleParameter[])
member.summary: Execute an OracleCommand that returns the first column of the first record against an existing database connection using the provided parameters.
member.remarks: e.g.: Object obj = ExecuteScalar(conn, CommandType.StoredProcedure, "PublishOrders", new OracleParameter(":prodid", 24));
member.param: the stored procedure name or PL/SQL command
an array of OracleParamters used to execute the command
member.returns: An object that should be converted to the expected type using Convert.To{Type}

member.summary: Add a set of parameters to the cached
